name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in designing and developing robust software solutions across various domains. Highly proficient in **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **C++**, with a strong foundation in multi-process architecture, continuous learning, and debugging. Adept at memory and performance profiling to optimize application efficiency and deliver high-performing systems. Experienced in defining API specifications and ensuring standards compliance, crucial for maintaining the integrity of enterprise applications.

Demonstrates exceptional collaboration and problem-solving skills while leading cross-functional teams to create innovative solutions. Versatile in cloud technologies, having successfully deployed cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**. Skilled in a wide range of frameworks, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **Django**, and **FastAPI**, integrating AI/ML capabilities for enhanced analytics and automation. Committed to building secure and maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed scalable, full-stack applications using **JavaScript** and **C++**, addressing performance challenges through multi-process architecture, debugging, and memory profiling to enhance application stability and efficiency.
•	Ensured compliance with industry standards by designing applications that adhere to robust API specifications and relevant regulatory requirements, all while fostering continuous learning among team members.
•	Employed **HTML**, **CSS**, and modern frameworks to build responsive and user-friendly interfaces, integrating collaborative tools that encouraged team problem-solving and improved development workflows.
•	Led efforts in debugging complex systems while profiling application performance to optimize load times, ensuring high availability and compliance with **performance profiling** benchmarks.
•	Promoted an environment of collaboration and problem-solving, mentoring junior developers in effective debugging techniques and best practices in **API specifications**.
•	Implemented multi-process architecture strategies to manage large-scale applications, increasing resource allocation efficiency by **30%** in production environments.
•	Facilitated ongoing technical discussions and performance reviews, encouraging information sharing and knowledge transfer across teams to foster a culture of **continuous learning**.
•	Coordinated with cross-functional teams to ensure optimal performance across applications, improving response times by **25%** through proactive memory profiling and optimizations.
•	Engaged in code reviews focusing on performance profiling and debugging practices, successfully decreasing bug rates in production by **40%**.

Developed and enhanced financial software solutions utilizing **JavaScript** (React 18, Vue 3, Next.js, TypeScript) and **HTML/CSS**, ensuring adherence to API specifications and standards compliance to deliver high-quality user experiences.
Applied multi-process architecture and performance profiling techniques, optimizing application throughput by **30%** through strategic debugging and memory profiling in live environments.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate scalable microservices, leveraging **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to ensure robust system architecture capable of handling **100,000+** transactions per minute.
Utilized problem-solving abilities to create dynamic user-focused applications and dashboards, enhancing user engagement and operational efficiency by **25%**.
Engaged in continuous learning to stay updated on industry trends and cutting-edge technologies, enhancing personal expertise in software development and application performance optimization.
Facilitated collaboration with stakeholders, ensuring seamless communication and alignment with project goals, bridging team efforts towards delivering high-impact solutions.

Applied strong debugging and performance profiling skills to optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**, ensuring high availability and low latency across key modules such as checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Demonstrated problem-solving abilities by engineering real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
Utilized JavaScript frameworks **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular** for frontend application development, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, delivering fast and responsive user experiences optimized for both web and mobile platforms.
Managed distributed data storage solutions with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and enhancing application performance through effective caching strategies.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, boosting conversion rates by providing personalized product listings based on real-time behavioral data.
Utilized **Redis** caching to enhance responsiveness for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, achieving a **50%** improvement in application responsiveness and reducing database load.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments with **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, facilitating controlled rollouts and A/B testing for risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce user interfaces using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, achieving compliance with **WCAG 2.1** and ensuring effective mobile-first engagement.
Developed secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, applying tokenized transactions and adhering to PCI compliance for handling sensitive data securely.
Utilized role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to ensure secure customer and admin access, reinforcing GDPR compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
